explains: adj. 甘美的；满足感官的

sentences.en: I bet you dyed your hair only because you're jealous of my luscious hair!
sentences.cn: 我敢打赌你染头发只是因为你嫉妒我的秀发!

sentences.en: It was a clear little stream which ran quite merrily along on its narrow way through the luscious damp greenness.
sentences.cn: 这是一条清澈的小溪，在狭窄的道路上欢快地流过香甜潮湿的绿草地。

sentences.en: The dancers bathed in luscious strains.
sentences.cn: 跳舞者沉浸在悦耳的乐曲中。
